    b_lst = sorted(horizontal_bars, key=lambda x: x[1])
    pare_lst = []

        temp = i_lst[ind]
        i_lst[ind] = i_lst[ind - 1]
        i_lst[ind - 1] = temp
        pare_lst.append((i_lst[ind], i_lst[ind - 1]))

    for i in range(n):

            max_dec = new_s_lst[b] - new_s_lst[a]
    return ans - max_dec
